巡.definition: to patrol; to make one's rounds; classifier for rounds of drinks

巡捕.definition: to patrol; policeman (in China's former foreign concessions)

巡捕房.definition: (old) police station in a foreign concession 租界[zu1 jie4]

巡撫.definition: inspector-general of province in Ming and Qing times

巡更.definition: to patrol at night, marking the time by sounding clappers or gongs

巡演.definition: (theater etc) to tour; to be on tour; to give itinerant performances (abbr. for 巡迴演出|巡回演出[xun2hui2 yan3chu1])

巡禮.definition: to make a pilgrimage (to visit a holy site); to go on a sightseeing tour

巡行.definition: to patrol; to perambulate; to travel around within an area

巡視.definition: to patrol; to make a tour; to inspect; to scan with one's eyes

巡警.definition: police patrol; patrol officer; (old) police officer

巡迴.definition: to go around; to roam; to tour

巡迴演出.definition: (theater etc) to tour; to be on tour; to give itinerant performances
